lines.text: read line from the input into str
declare string variable with name s
vec is a new vector of strings
while can read s from ss , push s into vec
lines.code: while ( ss >> s ) vec . push_back ( s ) ;

lines.text: declare new integers ans and cnt
change the value of ans to assign 0 to cnt
for i from 0 to length of vec exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < vec . size ( ) ; ++ i )

lines.text: start for loop from j = 0 to length of vec [ i ] exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < vec [ i ] . size ( ) ; ++ j )

lines.text: if vec [ i ] [ j ] is a capital letter character , increment cnt
lines.code: if ( vec [ i ] [ j ] >= ' A ' && vec [ i ] [ j ] <= ' Z ' ) cnt ++ ;

lines.text: change the value of ans to max of ans and cnt
